column3: Social;Koh Kong:------ On the afternoon of September 23
column5: a young man with his family went to visit  Ta Tai Waterfall
column6: Koh Kong Province. The man slipped into the water
column7: went over the falls and disappeared.------The missing victim was Souk Chan Chav
column8: a 24-year-old from Koh Kong Province.------A force searched for the victim until 9:30 pm but he couldn’t be found
column9: and police will continue to search.
